content.en: Text recognition: Researchers have developed various algorithms to improve the detection and recognition of text in natural scenes. These algorithms use advanced techniques such as convolutional neural networks, region proposal mechanisms, deep learning frameworks, and feature fusion. By leveraging these algorithms, the researchers aim to achieve more accurate and efficient text reading in real-world environments.
content.da: Tekstgenkendelse: Forskere har udviklet forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre detektion og genkendelse af tekst i naturlige scener. Disse algoritmer bruger avancerede teknikker såsom konvolutionsneuronale netværk, regionforslagsmekanismer, dybe læringsrammer og trækfusion. Ved at udnytte disse algoritmer sigter forskerne mod at opnå mere præcis og effektiv tekstlæsning i virkelige omgivelser.
